styleInstructions.Animation: Implement smooth, purposeful animations throughout the site. Use CSS transitions, keyframes, or libraries like Framer Motion/GSAP.
styleInstructions.Fun: Create a playful, engaging experience with unexpected interactions, bold colors, and delightful micro-animations.
styleInstructions.Minimal: Strip design to essential elements. Use a limited color palette (2-3 colors), simple geometric shapes, and ample negative space.
styleInstructions.Single Page: Build an immersive single-page experience with smooth scrolling and section-based navigation.
styleInstructions.Interactive: Implement cursor-following effects, hover state animations, and micro-interactions throughout. Elements should respond to user input.
styleInstructions.Light: Use a predominantly light color scheme with white/off-white backgrounds. Add depth through subtle shadows and muted accent colors.
styleInstructions.Dark: Implement a dark theme with deep backgrounds (#0a0a0a to #1a1a1a). Use high-contrast text and glowing accent colors.
styleInstructions.Big Background Image: Use a full-viewport hero section with a high-quality, atmospheric background image. Apply subtle overlays for text readability.
styleInstructions.Scrolling Animation: Use scroll-triggered animations with libraries like GSAP ScrollTrigger, Framer Motion, or CSS scroll-driven animations.
styleInstructions.Long Scrolling: Design an immersive single-page experience with distinct sections that flow narratively. Use sticky elements and parallax effects.
styleInstructions.Clean: Maintain generous whitespace, clear visual hierarchy, and minimal decorative elements. Focus on typography and content clarity.
styleInstructions.Bold Typography: Feature oversized display text, mix font weights dramatically, and use typography as a primary design element.
styleInstructions.Gradient: Apply smooth color gradients for backgrounds, text, or UI elements. Use mesh gradients or multi-stop linear gradients.
styleInstructions.3D: Incorporate 3D elements using Three.js, WebGL, or CSS 3D transforms. Add depth through perspective and spatial animations.
styleInstructions.Brutalist: Embrace raw, unpolished aesthetics with exposed structural elements, harsh contrasts, and unconventional layouts.
styleInstructions.Glassmorphism: Use frosted glass effects with backdrop-blur, subtle borders, and layered transparent surfaces.
styleInstructions.Grid Layout: Structure content in a clear grid system. Use CSS Grid for complex layouts with clear visual rhythm.
styleInstructions.Asymmetric: Break from conventional layouts with intentionally unbalanced compositions. Create visual tension and interest.
styleInstructions.Video Background: Use looping video backgrounds for immersive hero sections. Ensure videos are optimized and have fallbacks.
styleInstructions.Noise/Grain: Add subtle noise textures to backgrounds or images for a tactile, film-like quality.
styleInstructions.Retro: Incorporate nostalgic design elements like serif fonts, muted color palettes, and classic layout patterns.
styleInstructions.Experimental: Push boundaries with unconventional navigation, abstract visuals, and innovative interaction patterns.

fontSuggestions.Inter: Highly legible sans-serif for UI. Modern and versatile. Pairs with: Fraunces, Playfair Display, or Space Grotesk.
fontSuggestions.NB International: Modern geometric sans-serif. Pairs well with: GT America, Inter, or a serif like Editorial New.
fontSuggestions.Space Grotesk: Tech-forward sans-serif with distinctive character shapes.
fontSuggestions.Manrope: Modern geometric sans-serif, open-source alternative to paid fonts.
fontSuggestions.SF Pro: Apple's system font. Clean and professional.
fontSuggestions.Söhne: Contemporary Swiss-style sans-serif. Elegant and versatile.
fontSuggestions.Neue Montreal: Modern grotesk with character. Works well at large sizes.

frameworkTips.React: Use React with hooks for state management. Consider Framer Motion for animations.
frameworkTips.Next.js: Leverage App Router, Server Components, and next/image for optimization.
frameworkTips.Tailwind CSS: Use utility-first classes. Consider tailwind-animate or @tailwindcss/typography plugins.
frameworkTips.Radix UI: Use unstyled, accessible components as a foundation for custom UI.
frameworkTips.Framer: Use Framer's visual builder for rapid prototyping with code-level customization.
frameworkTips.GSAP: Industry-standard animation library. Use ScrollTrigger for scroll-based animations.
frameworkTips.Three.js: WebGL library for 3D graphics. Consider React Three Fiber for React integration.
frameworkTips.Vercel: Deploy with Vercel for optimal Next.js performance, edge functions, and analytics.
